title: operational technology systems
extract: Operational systems include production line management, mining operations control, oil & gas monitoring etc. Industrial control systems (ICS) is a major segment within the operational technology sector. It comprises systems that are used to monitor and control industrial processes.Jul 7, 2015
extract_html: Operational systems include production line management, mining operations control, oil & gas monitoring etc. Industrial control systems (ICS) is a major segment within the operational technology sector. It comprises systems that are used to monitor and control industrial processes.Jul 7, 2015
